Posts.EditableText:
So, while testing my game that isn't yet published, I had obtained the key I needed to open a door, and when I typed    "use key"    "unlock Jaidens door"    or whatever I could think of, it didn't work.

Do keys not work? Do I have to make it so that when the player gets to key the door automatically unlocks? I'm sorry if this is foolish.
Posts.HTML:
So, while testing my game that isn't yet published, I had obtained the key I needed to open a door, and when I typed "use key" "unlock Jaidens door" or whatever I could think of, it didn't work.

Do keys not work? Do I have to make it so that when the player gets to key the door automatically unlocks? I'm sorry if this is foolish.
